DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate change intraocular pressure due increase intra abdominal pressure .
DOC.brief_title: This Study Performed Develop New Technique Measuring Intra Abdominal Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective study , 40 patient undergoing elective surgery include . Patients divide four group 10 patient . The control group ( Group C ) subject laparoscopic intervention . Laparoscopic surgery respectively perform intra-abdominal pressure 9 , 12 15 mmHg Groups L ( low ) , M ( medium ) , H ( high pressure ) . Intraocular pressure measure binocularly patient three different time ( , end surgery ) use contact tonometer .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 30 kg/m2 less American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) status III Preexisting eye disease , Cardiovascular neuromuscular disease , Difficult intubation , The use antihypertensive agent .
